name: @yotpoltd/cadr-cli
description: Continuous Architectural Decision Records - Automatically capture ADRs as you code

scripts.postbuild: if [ -f dist/index.js ]; then if ! head -1 dist/index.js | grep -q '^#!/usr/bin/env node$'; then echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/index.js > dist/index.tmp && mv dist/index.tmp dist/index.js; fi; chmod +x dist/index.js; fi
